radiographic_examinations.findings: Stones and sludge in the mildly distended gallbladder with gallbladder wall thickening. No definite pericholecystic fluid is identified. Hepatic parenchyma appears within normal limits. No focal liver mass. Main portal vein is patent. No ascites. No intrahepatic biliary dilation. Limited views of kidneys show no hydronephrosis.
